namwonmkw wrote:
> 
> I would like to test a shopping cart that resides in the session.  Is
> there a way to keep session scoped data between cacatus test? Or
> should I setup my shopping cart for each test with the appropriate data?

I would do the latter. Moreover, for the objects you plan to put in the 
session, I would test their behavior entirely outside the context of 
being in the session. After that, only a few tests are needed to verify 
when the object is put into and taken out of the session. _JUnit 
Recipes_ describes the details in Part 2.

Good luck.
-- 
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
